coreAttributes.name: Deep Roar
coreAttributes.description: A glass bottle filled with arrack; a distilled alcoholic drink made from fermented coconut sugar. The branding on the front proudly carries the name 'Deep Roar', while a label on the back describes how a family of tiger-morphs have been distilling this beverage for twelve generations.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.45)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unscrew)] the cap from the bottle of Deep Roar, before tilting [npc.her] head back and bringing it up to [npc.her] waiting [npc.lips]. An extremely strong alcoholic scent rises from the opening, and with a gulp, [npc.name] [npc.verb(start)] downing the liquid, discovering that it tastes like a floral dark rum.
